name: DeadMouse
body:
### Ditch your mouse. Browse the web with just your keyboard.
DeadMouse is a Google Chrome extension that will let you click links on web pages just by typing them out.

### Try it out right on this page!

Start typing the text of any of the following links. Don't touch that mouse!

(Sample links here)

### Get it now

[Click me to install DeadMouse](install link)

### Features
* Follow links just by typing
* Fuzzy-matching on link text
* Tab-cycle through multiple matches
tagline: Click on links without the mouse; just start typing. A Google Chrome extension.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
